Systems Research Lab > Events
Joe Buck talks on Optimizing Hadoop for Structured Queries over Structured Data

Joe Buck talks on Optimizing Hadoop for Structured Queries over Structured Data

May 8, 2012
E2-375

Joe Buck will give a seminar talk about his recent work on optimizing the Hadoop framework to leverage knowledge of structured data to optimize the data flow of the program, and thereby improve performance. Other benefits, including early results, better resource usage and efficient pipe-lining are also enabled.

Host: Scott Brandt
